1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: As the tourist season opens, new tattooist Steven arrives with the crowds. Customers include Kieran and James (the first to puke gets tattooed) and Jo - who has to visit a Chinese restaurant to find out what her new tattoo means.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Tattoo artist Dodos loses patience with a client. A man tries to impress his girlfriend by having one of his tattoos redesigned. 3 friends go on a body art binge with one getting a tattoo in a very sensitive part of the body.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Georgia has fallen for her holiday rep and decided to get his name tattooed on her bum. Madison is so impressed with Kavos' nitrous-oxide balloons that she gets a bizarre design tattooed on her foot mixing balloons and half a chicken.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: After a drunken night out one lad wakes up with what he thinks is a "burger nipple", while another loses a bet with his mates - meaning that he has now got to have pictures of them all tattooed on his backside.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Three workers from a strip-club have a contest to drum up more business. A holiday-maker has his friends names tattooed on his backside while another comes up with a design representing his favourite body part.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Josh decides that a tattoo of boxer Mike Tyson would be a fitting reminder of his holiday. Jessica and Chloe celebrate their love of herbal drugs by getting their boobs tattooed.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Josh and Conor order matching tattoos. Lovebirds Ross and Claire get matching swallow designs. Joe and his mates come up with a bizarre slogan about an English footballing legend.

imdb.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink
akas: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink (United Kingdom)
plot: Documentary series following the staff and customers of a tattoo parlour catering to British tourists in the popular holiday destination of Kavos on the island of Corfu.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
